summary: The code defines two media streams: the first one is a video with a .mp4 extension and a speed of 1.5, while the second one is an audio file also with a .mp4 extension located at "/root/Desktop/works/pyjom/src/samples/video/dog_with_text.mp4", set to play at 1.5 speed but without video output.

details.comment: The code defines two media streams: the first one is a video with a .mp4 extension and a speed of 1.5, while the second one is an audio file also with a .mp4 extension located at "/root/Desktop/works/pyjom/src/samples/video/dog_with_text.mp4", set to play at 1.5 speed but without video output.
